Class AccountService

java.lang.Object
com.feis.eduhub.backend.features.account.service.AccountService
public class AccountService extends Object
Service class responsible for managing account-related operations such as functionalities for creating, reading, updating, and deleting account information through the use of the AccountDao layer class.
